A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, could the critics be any more paid off or scared of Disney?! Any other movie and the critics would be ripping it as a horrible piece of dung. I’m so sick of movies where the story is the good guy just running away the whole time\, in the same setting no less. Luke’s character makes no sense in any way or shape. Finn is a character you shouldn’t even like in any way or shape. Anyone with Jedi Power seems to have some kind of anime character like power up when they are down and out\, case in point Leia. The super villain is toothless and wears a Hugh Hefner robe\, actually I’m convinced it was Hugh (rip). There was literally one visually stunning scene\, it took place in space\, you’ll know it when you see it because it’s the only one. Oh and right off the bat I was put off because of the hokey dialog between Poe and Hux. I actually cringed at the childish humor they put into that and other scenes. I feel bad for anyone that was waiting with high hopes to go to this travesty.
